code: import React from"react";export var useInterval=function useInterval(callback,msDelay){var savedCallback=React.useRef(callback);React.useEffect(function(){savedCallback.current=callback;},[callback]);React.useEffect(function(){function useCallback(){savedCallback.current();}var id=setInterval(useCallback,msDelay);return function(){return clearInterval(id);};},[msDelay]);};
